msContents.summary: Pesaḳim and Ḥidushim of Isaiah of Trani, the Elder, on the treatises of Berakhot, Halakhot ḳeṭanot, ῾Avodah zarah and Ḥulin.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian cursive script of the 18th to 19th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine title: 'Isaiah of Trani. Pesakim. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 26,903.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile his manuscript no. 12; his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum through Asher & Co. in October 1865 for £1,000 through Adolphus Asher (b. 1800, d. 1853), Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum (see 131-153: inscribed (folio [127v]).
